methods.description: Returns a list of recently filled orders in a given market, in reverse order of execution.

parameters.description: the item being bought in this market

parameters.description: Number of transactions before head block to skip in listing

parameters.description: The maximum number of transactions to list

parameters.name: block_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of blocks in the past to search for orders

methods.description: Returns a list of price spreads in the given timeframe for the specified market.

parameters.name: quote_symbol
parameters.description: the symbol name the market is quoted in

parameters.name: base_symbol
parameters.description: the item being bought in this market

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The time to begin getting price history for

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The maximum time period to get price history for

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: The frequency of price updates (each_block, each_hour, or each_day)

methods.description: Returns a list of the current round's active delegates in signing order
Returns a list of all the delegates sorted by vote
Returns the block headers for blocks in a range

parameters.name: first_block_number
parameters.description: the first block to list. If limit is negative, a first_block_number of 0 indicates the head block; otherwise, 0 indicates the first block

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the maximum number of blocks to return. A negative value means to start at the head block and work backwards; a positive value means to start at the first block
